messages.subject: Unschooling vs. unparenting
messages.messageBody:
<<Yeah, what's THAT about anyway?>>

I think it is about people confusing the "no limits" with "no arbitrary limits". It is a fairly common thing in my experience. I don't think we can stress the arbitrary part enough.

Julie S.
----- Original Message -----
From: zenmomma@...
Date: Sunday, October 30, 2005 2:24 pm
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] New with a question or two......

> >>I seem to be running into a wave of people not wanting to use
> the
> term "unschooling" because they're associating it with "un-
> parenting," these days.>>
>
> Yeah what's THAT about anyway?
>
> --
> ~Mary
>
> "The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
> green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
> alive."
